alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 03 at 1:18AM MDT until April 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Montana and central, east central and north central Idaho. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains; Western Lemhi County
